product.name: Heat Gun for crafting 1800W, 122℉~1202℉ Variable Temperature Control with 2-Temp Settings 4 Nozzles, 1.5s Fast Heating Blue Heat Gun for Resin, Shrink PVC Tubing/Wrapping/Crafts and Vinyl Wrap
product.description: 7-Speed Temperature Adjustment Suitable for Various Scenarios
product.bullet_points:
• 【1800W Strong Power & Fast Heating】 1800W heating motor design allows TDAGRO heat gun for crafting to heat up to 1202℉ in 1.5 seconds, which helps increase the efficiency of the project and saves a lot of time.
• 【Variable Temp Control & 2 Modes】Upgraded heat gun for resin features with 7 variable temperature settings and 2 fan settings, allowing users to adjust the temperature from as low as 122℉ to as high as 1202℉, easily adjusting the temperature to accomplish countless tasks.
• 【Hands-Free & Overload Protection】 Integrated hands-free hands-free stand makes heat guns more stable for extended comfort to reduce fatigue from extended use. Also have an overload protector to avoid damage to your heat gun and electronic circuitry.
• 【Compact Design & Wide Applications】Compact design 20% smaller than the market, lightweight design but with big power. Ideal for shrinking heat shrink tubing/wrapping/Crafts; heating PVC, electronics, cell phone repair, car wrap; removing paint or floor tiles, loosening rusty bolts and other heating or defrosting applications.
• 【4 Extra nozzles & 100% Customer Service】4 different nozzles make TDAGRO hot air gun easy to handle in every scenario. If you have any questions about this shower curtain set, please do not hesitate to contact us.
